Uses of Event in elevatorsimulation.event.elevator
 

Subclasses of Event in elevatorsimulation.event.elevator
 class CreateElevator
          This class is used to simulate the event if an elevator needs to be created.
 class ElevatorAI
          This class is used to simulate the AI which drives the elevators, it updates the People waiting on the floors for elevators.
 class ElevatorGettingFixed
          This class is used to simulate the event when an elevator is getting fixed.
 class ElevatorMoves
          This class is to simulate the event where an elevator moves It makes an elevator move either up or down.
 class ElevatorStopsWorking
          This class is used to simulate the event where the elevator stops working for the duration specified.
 class PeopleEnteringElevator
          This class is used to simulate the event where people enter the elevator.
 class PeopleLeavingElevator
          This class is used to simulate the event where people leave the elevator
 

Uses of Event in elevatorsimulation.event.person
 

Subclasses of Event in elevatorsimulation.event.person
 class PersonArrives
          This class is used to simulate the event when a person arrives at a level.
